source.title: At This Very Moment in This Work Here I Am

content: Levinas: “to shelter the other in one’s own land or home, to tolerate the presence of the landless and homeless on the ‘ancestral soil,’ so jealously, so meanly loved—is that the criterion of humanness? unquestionably so”

source.title: At This Very Moment in This Work Here I Am

content: “he will have obligated (il aura obligé),” a phrase knotted up (se noue) in a certain way of tying (lier), a serial structure of a singular type > edges of the sentence in fog, belong to the night

source.title: At This Very Moment in This Work Here I Am

content: you hear me: at a distance, which doesn’t forbid, on the contrary, proximity

source.title: At This Very Moment in This Work Here I Am

content: what is said inside (dedans) can infinitely overflow all context, at a stroke (d’un coup)

source.title: At This Very Moment in This Work Here I Am

content: no utterance ever cut from all context, context never annulled w/out remainder: one negotiates w/ les effets de bord, incl. nonnegotiable, that which overflows (déborde) all context

source.title: At This Very Moment in This Work Here I Am

content: to neither pay homage to, nor “rendez-vous” w/ Levinas, a gesture beyond any possible restitution, operating w/out debt: absolute ingratitude, Derrida would pay homage to Levinas’ radical generosity, which requires, “ingratitude de l’autre”

source.title: At This Very Moment in This Work Here I Am

content: absolute dissymmetry of the gift, wanting to give by receiving, wanting to avoid commerce, mastery (feeling trapped), economic reappropriating: sensitive to the excess that overflows language > nothing is more difficult than to except a gift

source.title: At This Very Moment in This Work Here I Am

content: the trap of obeying Levinas in restituting nothing, one becomes deaf to his obligation, but it only feels like a trap when inclined toward mastery, when one pretends to escape from absolute dissymmetry

source.title: At This Very Moment in This Work Here I Am

content: gift of other, debt w/out contract, demands: at the same time, indefinitely equivalent substitution (anonymity) and singularity (rather, absolute uniqueness of proper name)

source.title: At This Very Moment in This Work Here I Am

content: the gift is not

source.title: At This Very Moment in This Work Here I Am

content: for Levinas, sincerity or rectitude: the right of the gift (not derived from a jurisdiction transcendent to the gift itself), to go right to the unique, what his name will have uniquely named

source.title: At This Very Moment in This Work Here I Am

content: every present remains w/in the economic sphere of the same

source.title: At This Very Moment in This Work Here I Am

content: [re: giving to EL w/out restitution] excess that overflows language sets it into motion at moment of traversing it > this traversal is not transgression (passage of a sharply dividing limit) > metaphor of overflowing no longer fits—too linear [?]

source.title: At This Very Moment in This Work Here I Am

content: doing so in a way, where the fault (la faute) [see p. 149 Derrida’s fault, failing], which consists in inscribing tout autre in empire of same, alters the same enough to absolve it of itself

source.title: At This Very Moment in This Work Here I Am

content: how can Levinas inscribe le tout autre in language of being, of the present, w/in its syntax, lexicon, under its law? > or: cette langue n’est pas d’elle-même déliée, opens to tout autre?

source.title: At This Very Moment in This Work Here I Am

content: Levinas: psyche as a seed of folly, a psychosis, not an ego (Moi), but me (moi) under assignation—arrachement-à-soi-pour-un-autre (torn-up-from-oneself-for-another)

source.title: At This Very Moment in This Work Here I Am

content: otherwise (autrement), the adverb in Otherwise than Being which wins out immeasurably over a verb, the beyond of the symplokē [linking nouns & verbs, that of essence], leaving a chain of traces, another symplokē [beyond essence]

source.title: At This Very Moment in This Work Here I Am

content: re: Levinas, “astriction to giving” complicates quoted utterance “here I am,” what is said only once, what exceeds not the saying but the said in language

source.title: At This Very Moment in This Work Here I Am

content: Levinas’ substitution: astriction to giving and extradition of subjectivity to the other

source.title: At This Very Moment in This Work Here I Am

content: Levinas’ “here I am” or “I think”: a restlessness driving me out of substantiality

source.title: At This Very Moment in This Work Here I Am

content: the grammatical utterance [“here I am”?] is there, but put out of joint (disloqué), making room (that is not a home) for an agrammaticality of the gift assigned from the other (depuis l’autre)

source.title: At This Very Moment in This Work Here I Am

content: [vis-à-vis Levinas] interdictory language is interdicted but continues speaking, can’t help itself, can only continue strangely interrupting itself > essential function of a quotation: quoting the uncitable accuses language, (sur)rendered to a gift language can’t open up on its own

source.title: At This Very Moment in This Work Here I Am

content: for Levinas, logos is not secondary/instrumental, it remains indispensable as fold (pli) that bends (se plie) to the gift, as the tongue (langue) of my mouth when I tear bread from it to give it to the other > it is also my body

source.title: At This Very Moment in This Work Here I Am

content: passage beyond language requires language, or requires text as a place for the trace of a step (pas) that passes beyond language, not (present) elsewhere [not classical]

source.title: At This Very Moment in This Work Here I Am

content: interruptive breakthrough occurs, ineluctable au moment même when Levinas’ philosophical récit claims to reappropriate the tear (déchirure) w/in the continuum of its (sa) texture

source.title: At This Very Moment in This Work Here I Am

content: Levinas negotiates his negotiation w/ the unnegotiable in a way where he negotiates the negotiation (he reties the thread, weaves his interruptions of the same), to give the other a chance [Derrida refers to a double negation here], reprend dans sa toile l’histoire de toutes ses ruptures

source.title: At This Very Moment in This Work Here I Am

content: Levinas’ 2 instances of “en ce moment même,” le même moment: one belongs to the dialectic, the other has an infinite advance on the 1st, differs/defers it, and yet it is the same

source.title: At This Very Moment in This Work Here I Am

content: Levinas’ “en ce moment même” [of reappropriation] obligated by the second “en ce moment même” [of interruption] > forms a text w/ its own tear (déchirure), this “series” does not enclose the Other but opens itself up from out of irreducible difference—before any present moment

source.title: At This Very Moment in This Work Here I Am

content: when Levinas says responsibility is “probably” the essence of language: must allow language freedom to betray its own essence [ethical] so that it can surrender (se rendre) to it

source.title: At This Very Moment in This Work Here I Am

content: there must be a series of Levinas’ même moment if writing of dislocation of the Same toward the Relation [to the Other] is to have a chance, a hold (prise)

source.title: At This Very Moment in This Work Here I Am

content: “chance” because: even if obligated, one is not constrained to read what's given to be read

source.title: At This Very Moment in This Work Here I Am

content: the Relation to the Other is not a phenomenal monstration, and is not readable w/in the uncertainty of rigorous limits of a lexicon, language, semiotics, logic, etc.

source.title: At This Very Moment in This Work Here I Am

content: the Relation to the Other is not a phenomenal monstration, and is not readable w/in the uncertainty of rigorous limits of a lexicon, language, semiotics, logic, etc.

source.title: At This Very Moment in This Work Here I Am

content: the tear must be saved by playing seam against seam (couture)

motif.title: UNSCATHED / SAFE / SACRED / GUARD / SECURITY / KEEP

source.title: At This Very Moment in This Work Here I Am

content: no tear (déchirure) possible in Levinas’ text w/out a certain notching (échancrure) of the 2nd moment, and certain contamination btwn the 2 > he likes the tear he detests contamination

source.title: At This Very Moment in This Work Here I Am

content: [re: Levinas’ sériature] cette reprise (this mending resumption) is the condition by which beyond essence keeps (garde) its chance [see p. 160] against the enveloping seam (couture enveloppante) of the dialectic or thematic

motif.title: UNSCATHED / SAFE / SACRED / GUARD / SECURITY / KEEP

source.title: At This Very Moment in This Work Here I Am

content: for Levinas, interruption puts an end to the authority of the Said, the thematical, dialectical, the same, the economical

source.title: At This Very Moment in This Work Here I Am

content: “metaphors” of seam and tear (couture et déchirure) obsess Levinas’ texts

source.title: At This Very Moment in This Work Here I Am

content: Levinas describes how the enveloping continuum or tissue of the State, the dialectic, etc., preserves itself by cutting out interruptions and retying/maintaining itself in suppressing them: Levinas reties cut threads (not continuous ones): this is the trace of his diachrony, trace of discontinuity

source.title: At This Very Moment in This Work Here I Am

content: p. 165 since interruption is not a cut but logic of ab-solute de-stricturation, since it is reappropriable: to insist on the hiatus, the series is necessary > series has no single knot, but knots a multiplicity of retied knots (noeuds re-noués)

source.title: At This Very Moment in This Work Here I Am

content: if the State leaves a trace of interruptions too, how does Levinas’ tracing of them differ? it ties together interruptions btwn threads [i.e. doesn’t tie threads], a series out of series (hors-série) > series: hiatus must insist

source.title: At This Very Moment in This Work Here I Am

content: since the State reties knots around interruptions too, Levinas must be retying cut threads instead of continuous ones, though Derrida stresses these knots look the same

source.title: At This Very Moment in This Work Here I Am

content: opening of interruption is never pure

source.title: At This Very Moment in This Work Here I Am

content: Levinas obligates w/out constraint, by way of nonphenomenality, to read the trace as trace, interruption as interruption (i.e. acc. as such no longer reappropriable as phenomenon of essence)

source.title: At This Very Moment in This Work Here I Am

content: series (file, sequence, lineage…), seira (chord, chain, lasso…), sero (interlace, braid…), eirō ties interlacing of lace, the symplokē of discourse & the link

source.title: At This Very Moment in This Work Here I Am

content: how does EL calculate [so vigilantly], how does the other calculate in him, to leave room for the incalculable?

source.title: At This Very Moment in This Work Here I Am

content: Levinas’ linking of interruptions: a stricture of moments of rupture

source.title: At This Very Moment in This Work Here I Am

content: [Levinas’ negotiation w/ interruption and reappropriation] is a style, an idiom that marks the negotiation w/ a singular and irreplaceable seal

source.title: At This Very Moment in This Work Here I Am

content: [Derrida wonders about the risk of Levinas’ obligated negotiation, what he calls an inevitable “concession”: to stricture interruptions, contaminate, interrupt them]

source.title: At This Very Moment in This Work Here I Am

content: via Levinas, interruptions unbound “together,” in the “same” sériature, in dia-synchrony, a serial one time of “several times” that took place only once: the ob-ligation, ligature of religion opens

source.title: At This Very Moment in This Work Here I Am

content: for Levinas, in search of God uncontaminated by Being, contact is a priori contamination > graver yet: risk of contamination that surfaces before contact, in necessity of tying interruptions together (insistence of ruptures)

source.title: At This Very Moment in This Work Here I Am

content: [re: Levinas] no edges in this interruptive series, in this incomparable stricture, but tapering points (establishing continuity at a distance [?]) > binding & unbinding, the lace (lacet) of obligation is in place (not a trap): an ob-ligation that un-binds, opens up religion in this very unbinding

source.title: At This Very Moment in This Work Here I Am

content: contamination is no longer a risk but a fate that must be assumed [from risk to fate]

source.title: At This Very Moment in This Work Here I Am

content: “lace of obligation holds language…prevents it from falling apart in passing through eyelets of a texture [reappropriation?]: alternatively inside and outside, below and above, before and beyond”

source.title: At This Very Moment in This Work Here I Am

content: Levinas: proximity as responsibility for the Other, and responsibility for the Other as substitution

source.title: At This Very Moment in This Work Here I Am

content: acc. Levinas, humanity has to undergo a de-rangement of essence “so that it won’t find only violence repugnant”

source.title: At This Very Moment in This Work Here I Am

content: there is no Hegelian Phoenix after Levinas’ consummation of me [i.e. not Me] for the other [passivity more passive…], no being reborn from out the ashes

source.title: At This Very Moment in This Work Here I Am

content: Levinas: the substitution of the hostage discovers the trace

source.title: At This Very Moment in This Work Here I Am

content: Levinas: in the just war waged against war, trembling, relaxed virility w/out cowardice—passivity more passive than any passivity

source.title: At This Very Moment in This Work Here I Am

content: how does one hear “one must” in Derrida’s polysemic “l’oeuvre d’E.L. aura obligé”

source.title: At This Very Moment in This Work Here I Am

content: what to make of a signature [Levinas’] when “il aura obligé,” when Il signs in his place?

source.title: At This Very Moment in This Work Here I Am

content: the taking place in another place of Levinas’s oeuvre is an extravagant topic, another thinking of the name, a thinking that is tout autre because open to the name of the other (u-topic only for those who believe they know ce qui a lieu et ce qui tient lieu)

source.title: At This Very Moment in This Work Here I Am

content: [vis-à-vis Levinas] one can no longer think oeuvre in technical or productive order of operation (poiein, facere, agere, tun, wirken, erzeugen)

source.title: At This Very Moment in This Work Here I Am

content: how to cite when Levinas places the whole language (French & Western) btwn quotation marks? at same time “he” is in quotation marks: the nameless signatory w/out authorial signature, “he” who undersigns every work, met en oeuvre tout ouvrage

source.title: At This Very Moment in This Work Here I Am

content: [Levinas’ work] a fabrication of quotation marks crocheting a text w/out edge (bordure): seriality irreducibly knots a text to a language

source.title: At This Very Moment in This Work Here I Am

content: infinite law of quotation marks suspends all reference, work enclosed in a borderless context it gives to itself (se donne à elle-même), while making absolute reference to command of tout autre

source.title: At This Very Moment in This Work Here I Am

content: a performative w/out present, w/out self-congratulatory success, not an act of prowess

source.title: At This Very Moment in This Work Here I Am

content: Levinas has not only withdrawn dissymmetrical responsibility from circle (of pact, debt, synchronic reciprocity, recognition) but also from annular alliance, from the rounds (tour), whatever makes the rounds of a finger, of a sex or sexual organ [?]

source.title: At This Very Moment in This Work Here I Am

content: for “passivity more passive than…” not to turn into its opposite: skin must be torn away and its adherence must be kept beneath the cut (a tearing away that limits itself)

source.title: At This Very Moment in This Work Here I Am

content: for Levinas, to make passage to other, there can’t be an absolute erasure, withdrawal must appear, “He,” only there in seriasure, a series of hiatuses (mouth agape), enlaced erasures

source.title: At This Very Moment in This Work Here I Am

content: “passivity more passive than…”: hear it as most provocative thought today, not a transgression, it was first of all provoked

source.title: At This Very Moment in This Work Here I Am

content: the future anteriority of Levinas’ seriasure [each interruption will be knotted w/ another] is an eschatology w/out [beyond/otherwise than] philosophical teleology, appealing to a past anterior to any past; this future anteriority is irreducible to ontology or Hegelian teleology [in spite of irreducible resemblance]

source.title: At This Very Moment in This Work Here I Am

content: if Levinas insists on superimposing the trace, leaving a trace, entracing, how can we dissociate this trace from a sign?

source.title: At This Very Moment in This Work Here I Am

content: Levinas: the other can always dispossess me of my work

source.title: At This Very Moment in This Work Here I Am

content: Levinas plays a game that’s not a game, the gratuity of his work, what he still calls liturgy > “it is ethics itself”

source.title: At This Very Moment in This Work Here I Am

content: Levinas’ intr(el)aced saying [dire entr(el)acé]

source.title: At This Very Moment in This Work Here I Am

content: if a work signifies expenditure (dépense) or pure loss (perte) in a game, it would still be determined by economy

source.title: At This Very Moment in This Work Here I Am

content: the retrait Levinas re-marks is not unique, though it remarks the unique, its seriasure is unique > not his signature but his seriasure

source.title: At This Very Moment in This Work Here I Am

content: Levinas appeals to a tout autre which is sexually unmarked, thus making sexual difference secondary, and yet, this unsexed alterity is referred to as HE (IL) (Levinas: “the particularity of the feminine is secondary”)

source.title: At This Very Moment in This Work Here I Am

content: Derrida: secondary status of sexual difference signifies secondary states of feminine

source.title: At This Very Moment in This Work Here I Am

content: wouldn’t the making-secondary of sexual alterity become a mastery of sexual difference and thus of femininity?

source.title: At This Very Moment in This Work Here I Am

content: while discussing Levinas’ and [a certain] psychoanalysis’ secondarization of the woman, Derrida hypothesizes [?] that this complicit gesture gathers around one fundamental design: their relation to me, to the other as woman

source.title: At This Very Moment in This Work Here I Am

content: [re: Levinas] by making sexual difference secondary, by excluding the feminine, does She figure “the wholly other of this Saying of the wholly other,” thus under-signing the undersigned of the work [He?], that is, countersigning, not as a redoubling of the signature—but autrement que signer ——while discussing Levinas’ and [a certain] psychoanalysis’ secondarization of the woman, Derrida hypothesizes [?] that this complicit gesture gathers around one fundamental design: their relation to me, to the other as woman

source.title: At This Very Moment in This Work Here I Am

content: by excluding the woman in alterity, does the woman become the tout autre of Levinas’ seriasure, weaving the text from its other side

source.title: At This Very Moment in This Work Here I Am

content: sensitive to violence, Derrida reminds us that Levinas never erased the sexual mark of his signature, and referred to tout autre as feminine, this fault of Derrida’s, who does it wound?

source.title: At This Very Moment in This Work Here I Am

content: “I am speaking from my place as woman”

source.title: At This Very Moment in This Work Here I Am

content: to bury a text that erased the name of God [dysgraphy] is not to annihilate it (burn the whole thing): by inhuming the fault, one keeps it; a work of mourning which can either 1) be successful through spiritual interiorization, introjection 2) or else be paralyzed in melancholic pathology (incorporation)

source.title: At This Very Moment in This Work Here I Am

content: acc. Levinas, man, monotheistic man, has a unique relation to the ab-solute retrait of the revealed Name

source.title: At This Very Moment in This Work Here I Am

content: Derrida’s fault/violence against Levinas’ work can only wound Him [i.e. not EL] in his body, He/Il that preseals everything that carries a name > Derrida compares his fault to that of erasing God’s name from a book (a fault that is buried, mourned [not annihilated])

source.title: At This Very Moment in This Work Here I Am

content: can one analogize the fault against God’s name w/ fault against any Name? only if analogy functions btwn absolute heterogeneities [?] [theonymic cemetery]

source.title: At This Very Moment in This Work Here I Am

content: “je donne, je joue l’ingratitude contre la jalousie,” if God is exempt from jealousy (no desire for possession) must he not guard this exemption jealously, and in so doing lose himself? > ellipse de jalousie: le sans-jalousie se garde jalousement, autrement dit se perd, se-garde-se-perd: plus de jalousie [seriasure always a jalousie, series of traits & retraits, beyond the face]

motif.title: UNSCATHED / SAFE / SACRED / GUARD / SECURITY / KEEP

source.title: At This Very Moment in This Work Here I Am

content: as a woman, by reversing dissymmetry [of tout autre in Levinas], Derrida has added rape [alongside other violences: hostage, persecution, etc.]

source.title: At This Very Moment in This Work Here I Am

content: Levinas contaminates when he thematizes the nonthematizable, Derrida contaminates this irrepressible thematization in his turn (not structurally, but w/ a fault of his own)

source.title: At This Very Moment in This Work Here I Am

content: PLUS ASSEZ DE DIFFÉRENCE LÀ ENTRE ELLES ENTRE L’INHUMÉE OU LES CENDRES D’UN BRÛLE-TOUT

source.title: At This Very Moment in This Work Here I Am

content: inconsolable slowness of gift, as if necessary to delay the endless falling due (échéance) of repetition

source.title: At This Very Moment in This Work Here I Am

content: WE NEED A NEW BODY, UN AUTRE SANS PLUS DE JALOUSIE, THE MOST ANCIENT STILL (ENCORE) TO COME

source.title: At This Very Moment in This Work Here I Am

content: bottomless crypt gives one to read for a lapse above her body that decomposes on analysis
